parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The programming language of the application, such as Java and Go.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The microservice namespace to which the application belongs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SentinelEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the Sentinel-compatible mode.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The source of the application. The value is fixed as edasmsc.
